rules_text:
Destroy target nonland permanent.
Monument {W}{B} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text2:
[i]“Drink deep in your victories, as you will never fail again.”
—Siaveed, Commander of Armies[/i]
